import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{email,password});const token=response.data.token;localStorage.setItem('token',token);// Store the JWT in localStorage
alert('Login successful');}catch(error){alert('Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
